snippet: The average sales price rose 11 percent, to $1.87 million, compared with the same period in 2014, thanks to a strong local economy, combined with high demand and not enough listings.
abstract: Average price of homes in Manhattan rises to $1.87 million, up 11 percent from 2014; median sales price is $980,000, just shy of 2008 record of $1.025 million.
lead_paragraph: The average sales price rose 11 percent, to $1.87 million, compared with the same period in 2014, thanks to a strong local economy, combined with high demand and not enough listings.

headline.main: Average Home Price in Manhattan Reaches $1.87 Million, a New High
headline.print_headline: Home Prices in Manhattan Hit New High
